stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the correct calculation of Real Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?
choicesHtml:
Real GDP=(Nominal GDP/GDP deflator)×100 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5F9E@

Real GDP=(GDP deflator/Nominal GDP)×100 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5EAC@

Real GDP=(Nominal GDP×GDP deflator)×100 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6103@

Real GDP=(Nominal GDP+GDP deflator)×100 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5FCE@

Real GDP=(Nominal GDP−GDP deflator)×100 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5FFA@
